T-tests on mpg figures for different transmission types.

```{r}
mpg_aut <- mtcars[mtcars$am==0, "mpg"]
mpg_man <- mtcars[mtcars$am==1, "mpg"]

t.test(mpg_aut, mpg_man, paired=F)
```
